layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 170x26

              LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (1,1) size 164x20

                  text run at (0,0) width 160: "This text should not break "
                LayoutInline {<pseudo:after>} at (0,0) size 4x19
